title: Can I make video calls?
answer:
The phone does not support video calls out of the box. You can choose to install some third-party apps such as WeChat to make Internet video calls.

![note](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150805150520680001.jpg)

Try to make video calls when connected to a Wi-Fi network in order to reduce mobile data usage.
